name: Period Simulator
description:
AngelHack Lady Problems Hackathon Submission

Title: Period Simulator

Description: A game that teaches players about menstrual cycles.

CONTROLS

Main Menu: Use the mouse to click on the girl and move her to the different areas on the map
Menstrual Race: Use the arrow buttons
Pin the Pad on the Panties: Use arrow buttons
Tampon Practice: Use arrow buttons and space bar

I made this prototype at AngelHack's Lady Problems Hackathon in November 2016. I'm currently working on adding more features such as a story mode and more ~educational~ mini games.
